questions.question: Which UNESCO World Heritage Site, located in Peru, is known for its 15th-century Incan citadel set high in the Andes Mountains?
questions.context: Rediscovered in 1911 by American historian Hiram Bingham, this site is a popular symbol of the Incan Empire and one of the most visited attractions in Latin America.

questions.question: Which internationally renowned art museum in Vatican City houses the Sistine Chapel, famous for its ceiling painted by Michelangelo?
questions.context: Established in the early 16th century, this museum complex hosts hundreds of artworks from ancient Rome to the Renaissance.
